Parser Helper Functions

class crawler.web_crawler.parsers.ParserHelper.ParserHelper
static parser_price_to_float(logger: <module 'logging' from '/home/phil/.pyenv/versions/3.12.7/lib/python3.12/logging/__init__.py'>, price: str) → float | None

Parses a price string and converts it to a float.

This method handles different formats of price strings, including those with commas and periods as thousand or decimal separators. It returns the corresponding float value if successful. If the price string cannot be parsed, it logs an error and returns None.

Parameters:

  • logger (logging) – The logger object to log error messages.

  • price (str) – The price string to be parsed, which can include commas and periods in different formats.

Returns:

The parsed price as a float if successful, or None if the price string could not be parsed.

Return type:

Optional[float]
